languages.text: These boots double the {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} bonus that the allies gain from the wearer's {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
languages.original_text: Эти сапоги удваивают бонус к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}, который союзники персонажа получают от его {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Знак стойкости{/g}.

traits.locale_text: These boots double the {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} bonus that the allies gain from the wearer's {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

These boots double the {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} bonus that the allies gain from the wearer's {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

All allies in a 2-cell radius around the wearer gain a +40% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} from the {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Unyielding Beacon{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} instead of the original bonus.

These boots double the {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} bonus that the allies gain from the wearer's {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者使用{g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}不灭明光{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，所有盟友获得的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}加成翻倍。
languages.original_text: These boots double the {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} bonus that the allies gain from the wearer's {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用{g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}不灭明光{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，所有盟友获得的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}加成翻倍。

languages.text: このブーツは、使用者の{g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}不屈の標{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によって味方が得る{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決意力{/g}のボーナスを2倍にする。
languages.original_text: These boots double the {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} bonus that the allies gain from the wearer's {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 着用者の周囲2セル以内の味方は全て、本来のボーナスの代わりに{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標の{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}からくる{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}に40％の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Estas botas duplican la bonificación a la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} otorgada a los aliados mediante la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Dechado de firmeza{/g} del usuario.
languages.original_text: These boots double the {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} bonus that the allies gain from the wearer's {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Estas botas duplican la bonificación a la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} otorgada a los aliados mediante la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Dechado de firmeza{/g} del usuario.
